name: A KYLEISALIVE Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters found in "KYLEISALIVE", find a 4-letter word for a body of water.
questions.explanation:
Lake.

	A lake is usually made of fresh water.  Lakes are surrounded by land on all sides, and sometimes are attached to a river.  Some famous lakes are the Great Lakes, Lake Tahoe, and Lake Victoria.

questions.text: Now find a 3-letter word for a body of water, using only letters in "KYLEISALIVE".
questions.explanation:
Sea.

	Seas are made of salt water, and are much larger than lakes.  They are usually connected to an ocean.  Famous "seas" include the Mediterranean Sea, Black Sea, and Dead Sea.

questions.text: Using only letters in "KYLEISALIVE", find a 4-letter word meaning to shout.
questions.explanation:
Yell.

	To yell is to shout or to scream.  A lot of people yell when they are mad.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word meaning a decorative container to put flowers in, using only letters in "KYLEISALIVE".
questions.explanation:
Vase.

	Vases come in all different shapes, sizes, and colors.  They can hold many things used for decorating, like flowers.

questions.text: Using only letters in "KYLEISALIVE", find a 3-letter word meaning the opposite of "no".
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Yes means affirmative, or that you agree with something.  For instance, if someone asks you a yes or no question, you need to either agree with it (yes) or disagree with it (no).

questions.text: Find a 5-letter word, using only letters in "KYLEISALIVE", that means to exit a room.
questions.explanation:
Leave.

	To leave is to exit, or go away.  If someone leaves a room, they are no longer in that room, or if someone leaves the party, they aren't at the party anymore.

questions.text: Using only letters found in "KYLEISALIVE", find a 5-letter word meaning not dead.
questions.explanation:
Alive.

	When someone is alive, they have life, which means they can move and talk.  When someone is dead, though, they have lost their life, and they cannot move and talk.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only letters in "KYLEISALIVE", that means a drop in prices, like a 50% off one.
questions.explanation:
Sale.

	A sale is something that makes some items cheaper.  For instance, if a shirt store is having a 50% off sale, that means everything is 50% cheaper than its original price.

questions.text: Using only letters in "KYLEISALIVE", find a 3-letter word meaning to speak.
questions.explanation:
Say & Yak & Ask.

	To say means to speak, or express in words.  If I "say" that I will do my laundry, that means I have spoken the words "I am going to do my laundry."  That reminds me, I should do my laundry!  ;-)

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word meaning to tell an untruth, using only letters in "KYLEISALIVE".
questions.explanation:
Lie.

	If someone lies, they told an untruth, or fibbed.  Lie can also mean to lay down, as in "he lie down on his bed".
